description:
Good:
- Two objects cannot have the same name.
- The same object can be used in many diagrams
- The half-automatic layouting helps to focus on content
Improvement:
- Auto-layout of diagrams is sometimes not perfect
summary: Consistency of uml-model is supported well

description: Absolutely dont have idea how to work with it. UX can hardly be worse. UI is not very intuitive.
summary: Maybe works, but is hard to work with
